column1: 96381979$Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Tiger King$$FIRE$[Beast-Warrior/xyz]$$$$$4$2200$1800$$2 Level 4 Beast-Warrior monsters$$When this card is Xyz Summoned: You can Set 1 "Fire Formation" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the effects of all face-up Effect Monsters currently on the field
column3: until the end of your opponent's turn. When this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can send 3 "Fire Formation" Spells/Traps you control to the GY; Special Summon 2 Level 4 or lower Beast-Warrior monsters with the same ATK from your Deck

column1: 75840616$Bujintei Susanowo$$LIGHT$[Beast-Warrior/xyz]$$$$$4$2400$1600$$2 Level 4 "Bujin" monsters$$This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; take 1 "Bujin" monster from your Deck
column2: and either add it to your hand or send it to the Graveyard. You can only control 1 "Bujintei Susanowo".$$$$$

column1: 70355994$Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Gorilla$$FIRE$[Beast-Warrior/effect]$$$$$4$1600$1000$$$$Once per turn
column2: when this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the GY: You can Set 1 "Fire Formation" Spell directly from your Deck. Once per turn: You can send 1 face-up "Fire Formation" Spell/Trap you control to the GY
column3: then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.$$$$$

column1: 31320433$Number 47: Nightmare Shark$$WATER$[Sea Serpent/xyz]$$$$$3$2000$2000$$2 Level 3 monsters$$When this card is Special Summoned: You can attach 1 Level 3 WATER monster from your hand or your side of the field to this card as an Xyz Material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card
column2: then target 1 WATER monster you control; this turn
column3: that monster can attack your opponent directly

column1: 68601507$Bujingi Crane$$LIGHT$[Winged Beast/effect]$$$$$4$1600$300$$$$During damage calculation (in either player's turn)
column2: if a Beast-Warrior-Type "Bujin" monster you control battles an opponent's monster: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard; the ATK of your monster becomes double its original ATK
you can Special Summon this card (from your hand)
column3: but it cannot attack this turn. You can only Special Summon "Archfiend Commander" once per turn this way. When Special Summoned this way: Target 1 "Archfiend" card you control; destroy that target. When this card is Tribute Summoned: You can target 1 Level 6 "Archfiend" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Defense Position.$$$$$
